name: Demodern
description:
Demodern is an independent digital agency in Cologne and Hamburg, founded in 2008. We create innovative communications for the digital age. As a design agency, we do not only restrict ourselves to creative design, but take an end-to-end view of our projects, taking care of them from the strategic planning to the perfect implementation. 
Demodern is an open minded and free-thinking agency. Our corporate culture is based on exchange and demand.
